finalproject.utilities

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalproject.utilities.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the navigation class which drives the robot from one position on the field to another.
    Author:
    maxsn

    • Constructor Detail

      • Navigation

        public Navigation(Odometer odometer,
          lejos.hardware.sensor.EV3UltrasonicSensor midUS,
          lejos.hardware.sensor.EV3UltrasonicSensor rightUS)
        The public constructor for this class.
        Parameters:
        odometer - The active Odometer object currently tracking the robot's position.
        midUS - Reference to the middle US sensor.
        rightUS - Reference to the right US sensor.

    • Method Detail

      • setSpeeds

        public void setSpeeds(int lSpd,
             int rSpd)
        Set the speeds of both motor to an integer value.
        Parameters:
        lSpd - The desired left motor speed.
        rSpd - The desired right motor speed.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops both motors.

      • travelTo

            double y)
        Travels to a specified coordinate that's related to the robot's starting position.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x in cm
        y - coordinate y in cm

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double angle,
          boolean stop)
        Turns to a specified angle using the minimum angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle in [0,360) in degress.
        stop - Stop motors after turning or not.
